FuncDef:
The pki-domain command binds a PKI realm to an SSL policy.
The undo pki-domain command unbinds a PKI realm from an SSL policy. The pki-domain command binds a PKI realm to an SSL policy. The undo pki-domain command unbinds a PKI realm from an SSL policy. By default, no PKI realm is bound.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a PKI realm.
The value is a string of 1 to 64 case-sensitive characters without spaces.

Examples: Warning: A preset certificate is loaded to the specified PKI domain. The current operation has security risks. Continue? [Y/N]:y
ExtraInfo: You can run the pki-domain command to bind a PKI realm to an SSL policy.
